name: Heart-Rate
description: Get details related to the Heart-Rate of the individual including visualisations, average and abnormal values.

name: Steps
description: Get details related to the number of steps taken by the individual including visualisations and total value.

name: Walking / Running Distance
description: Get details related to the walking / running distance of the individual including visualisations and total value.

name: Flights Climbed
description: Get details related to the number of stairs climbed by the individual including visualisations and total value.

name: Step Length
description: Get details related to the length of steps by the individual including visualisations and range.

name: Walking Speed
description: Get details related to the walking speed of the individual including visualisations and range.

name: Location
description: Get details related to the location of the individual including map visualisations and tracking.
